seo.title: ResumeTerminal - Explore a Developer's Resume Through the Terminal
seo.description: An open-source, terminal-inspired resume application that lets you navigate professional experience using real command-line commands like 'cd', 'ls', and 'help'. Engage with projects, skills, and more in a unique and interactive way.
seo.category: Interactive Resume, Developer Portfolio, Web Application
seo.creator: Nick Neely
